document.full_text: a pakistani woman who was gang-raped and became a human rights campaigner says she worries other women will not speak out after pakistan's highest court upheld her alleged attackers' acquittals.
document.title: pakistani rape victim fears silence after acquittal
lines_and_colors: a pakistani woman who was gang-raped and became a human rights campaigner says she worries other women will not speak out after pakistan's highest court upheld her alleged attackers' acquittals.
